comments.text:
For FF4+, if you have a mousedown handler which is processing while the mouse is released, the mouseup handler is not fired.  This worked for pre-FF4.

The attachment has an XMLHttpRequest hitting two web URLs for both handlers.  To see it fail, just do a single click and release.  If the coded delay is long enough, you'll only see a mousedown recorded.  If you click and hold for a second or two (I watched with Fiddler to see when the requests completed), then release, you'll see a mousedown and mouseup.  Broken is both FF4 and FF5, worked in FF3.6.
